game.name: Drone Wars
game.description:
It will be amazing to prepare the role of a fighter and grab all the advanced tools before entering the battlefield! Unlike many other previous war games, this brand new adventure challenge allows you to play the role of a pilot of an advanced drone. Is not pretty exciting? Join Drone Wars and show off the world that you are a true fighter no matter which vehicles and weapons you have to handle with! Take your entry into the battlefield and get ready to destroy all your enemies before they attack you!

Remember all your enemies are also lashed with the advanced tools and weapons. Collect your cannons, load your missiles and allow yourself to take the seat of a drone pilot in this cool html5 fighting game! The pleasure of gaming will increase with sprucing up the difficulty levels. Your objective in all 30 levels will remain same i.e. destroying all the enemies that you see on the screen. Build specialized drones and finish the other drone colonies in this real-time strategy (RTS) game!

Do your best to launch missiles and lock the enemy planes to give them a strong reply! Be careful and no need to bother about the crashing of your drone! It will be amazing to be a part of this free online arcade challenge where you can see your drone becoming a fighter. Keep collecting ore from close by asteroids to your mothership with a purpose to build up your own drone colony! Weaken the power of your enemies by gaining new technology and attacking new drones! Every level has three modes to explore! Good luck to challenge fighting abilities in survival mode!!
